meo.title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern @ MEO
meo.info:
Traineeship focused mostly on Web Development in Laravel, developing features/audits to a Portal for the Operations team at MEO. Also managed databases, and implemented virtualization with ProxmoxVE and Docker.
